# 泰勒蓝图

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/taile-lantu
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/taile-lantu
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install taile-lantu
taile-lantu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g taile-lantu
taile-lantu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
